Based on the user's preferences and the list of movies provided, I would recommend the following two movies from this list:
1. "Let Me In" (2010)
This film stars Kodi Smit-McPhee as John Dunbar, a United States Army Special Forces Unit member who is sent to a remote western Civil War outpost. While at the outpost, Dunbar discovers that the nearby Sioux settlement has been invaded by another group of warriors from the same region. In order to protect his own people and their way of life, Dunbar decides to take action and fight back against the invading forces.
Overall, "Let Me In" is an excellent film that offers a compelling storyline, well-developed characters, and top-notch acting, cinematography, and sound design. Therefore, I would highly recommend "Let Me In" to anyone who enjoys watching high-quality films with engaging storylines, memorable characters, and top-notch acting, cinematography, and sound design.
